alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 11:07AM AKST until January 13 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow, with periods of blizzard conditions and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 2 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Ice will make roads slippery.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
